The ChatGPT Consolidator extension is designed to simplify and enhance your ChatGPT experience by consolidating and organizing conversations. Whether you're managing long chats or switching between multiple threads, this tool helps you stay organized and efficient.

Key Features:
Consolidate Conversations: Merge and organize chat threads into a single cohesive conversation for easy reference.
Insert Summaries: Seamlessly insert consolidated summaries into new or existing chat threads.
Export Options: Export conversations in various formats (JSON, HTML, CSV, and more) for documentation or sharing purposes.
User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive interface designed for quick access and efficient conversation management.
With ChatGPT Consolidator, streamline your conversations and stay productive with an organized chat history at your fingertips.
